name: Reverse DNS Lookup
description: Performs reverse DNS lookups to get hostnames from IP addresses with batch processing capabilities
author: NetScout-Go

parameters.name: IP Addresses
parameters.description: List of IP addresses for reverse lookup (one per line or comma-separated)

parameters.name: Timeout
parameters.description: Timeout in seconds for each lookup

parameters.name: DNS Server
parameters.description: DNS server to use for lookups (leave blank for system default)

parameters.name: Concurrent Lookups
parameters.description: Number of lookups to perform concurrently

parameters.name: Continue to iterate?
parameters.description: Enable repeated execution of this plugin with the same parameters
